attributes.action: Acknowledge the rights of all to their own names and expression.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the use of official forms of address and the abuse of title,  their historical associations lead many British citizens to prefer to be addressed by their own names, rather than a made up official version of it, We the undersigned wish that Government acknowledge the rights of people to their own names and titles (or no titles) on documents, [this would be an individual right, not dependent on whether or not they are a member of a minority population].

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
